actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the Nation should honor and recognize military families who have been disproportionately affected by the COVID-19 crisis.
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

summary.text: This resolution expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the country should honor the military families who have been disproportionately affected by the COVID-19 crisis.
